pages.text: The $(major)Claws$(0) Gene causes entities to have a chance to $(minor)inflict Bleeding on empty-handed melee attacks$(0).$(br2)When mutated into Claws 2, the chance is doubled.$(br2)This Gene $(minor)can be given to mobs$(0).
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br2)â€¢ Polar Bear
